question: Which city has broken the record for world’s largest fountain?
explanation:
The city of Dubai of United Arab Emirates (UAE) has broken the record for the world’s largest fountain. The Palm Fountain which covers an area of 14,366 square feet is located at the Pointe shopping and dining district on Palm Jumeirah of Dubai.
Dubai which is one of the seven emirates already holds the record for world’s tallest building and world’s fastest police car in service.
